basic_info.description: I am a software engineer with a passion for building robust software, creating amazing user experiences, and having a high impact in the areas of entrepreneurship, automation, education, writing, and games. I acquired these passions with a diverse background as a Marine Corps veteran and work experience in a variety of roles at the intersection of business and technology. This has given me a well-rounded foundation in understanding people, teams, and business. But through my diverse experiences I learned that I can have the greatest impact in all of these areas as a software engineer. Ever since I have fallen in love with engineering, I have dedicated my life to writing clean code and pursuing a life-long journey of continuously learning and improving as a programmer. I am a curious and ambitious learner in a wide range of fields, including web development, networking, cloud computing, DevOps, databases, and game development. I am hungry for constructive feedback, and am a leader in creating positive team dynamics that promote grit and a growth mindset in myself and others. In the future, I will dedicate my passions towards building my own companies. But until then, I look forward to dedicating those passions towards continuing to build an already great company with a great team today.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
